resolve().details: Can only be called once per game

createdAt().notice: Returns the timestamp when the game was created

creator().notice: Returns the address of the creator of this game

extraData().notice: Returns extra data for the game (implementation specific)

resolve().notice: Resolves the game and determines the winner

resolvedAt().notice: Returns the timestamp when the game resolved (0 if not resolved)

rootClaim().notice: Returns the root claim being disputed

status().notice: Returns the current status of the game
